plays.text: Goal scored by Mark Smith assisted by Matt Bradley and Kyle McLaren
Penalty to Jonathan Cheechoo 2 minutes for High Sticking Igor Larionov
Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Roughing Owen Nolan
Penalty to Owen Nolan 2 minutes for Diving Sean Avery
Goal scored by Kris Draper assisted by Luc Robitaille and Pavel Datsyuk
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Marco Sturm
Goal scored by Brad Stuart assisted by Teemu Selanne and Patrick Marleau
Penalty to Patrick Boileau 2 minutes for Tripping Scott Thornton
Penalty to Vincent Damphousse 2 minutes for Holding Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Dan McGillis 2 minutes for Hooking Brett Hull
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Igor Larionov
Goal scored by Brett Hull assisted by Pavel Datsyuk and Sergei Fedorov
Goal scored by Owen Nolan assisted by Todd Harvey and Mike Ricci
Goal scored by Henrik Zetterberg assisted by Brett Hull
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Tripping Teemu Selanne
Goal scored by Scott Thornton assisted by Teemu Selanne and Brad Stuart
Goal scored by Patrick Boileau assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Sergei Fedorov
